    • createAttributes

      protected FluidAttributes createAttributes()
      Description copied from class: Fluid
      Creates the fluid attributes object, which wilAl contain all the extended values for the fluid that aren't part of the vanilla system. Do not call this from outside. To retrieve the values use Fluid.getAttributes()
      Overrides:
      createAttributes in class Fluid
